STM: Struggling with the pace and difficulty of college courses, particularly in Computer Science and Calculus.
Feeling overwhelmed by the academic workload but finding some solace in making new friends in class.

MTM.Patterns: Difficulty with CS and Calculus, feeling overwhelmed, seeking solace in new friendships
MTM.Goals: Improve grades, manage workload, maintain social connections

LTM.Implications: Marks the beginning of higher education journey.

short_term: Secure a part-time job related to field of study
Join a study group for CS and Calculus
long_term: Complete undergraduate degree with good grades
Develop a professional network through internships and events

STM: Feeling disconnected from high school friends due to the fast pace of life changes.
Experiencing the typical awkwardness of dorm life with roommates and dorm social events.
Attempting to connect with new people but facing challenges, including awkward conversations and social missteps.

MTM.Summary: Facing challenges in maintaining and building new relationships.
MTM.Patterns: Disconnection from high school friends, awkwardness with roommates, social missteps
MTM.Goals: Strengthen existing relationships, form new bonds, improve social skills
MTM.Transition: Navigating the social dynamics of college life.

LTM.Milestone: Transition to dorm life at college.
LTM.Implications: Significant shift in living environment and social circle.

short_term: Attend campus social events to meet new people
Schedule regular calls with high school friends
long_term: Build a supportive social network at college
Improve interpersonal skills through workshops or counseling

STM: Dealing with sleep deprivation due to early morning classes and late-night noise in the dorms.
Concerned about personal health due to questionable dining hall food and the stress of college life.

MTM.Summary: Experiencing sleep deprivation and health concerns.
MTM.Patterns: Sleep issues due to dorm environment, health concerns from dining hall food
MTM.Goals: Establish sleep routine, prioritize healthy eating, reduce stress

short_term: Create and follow a sleep schedule
Explore healthier eating options on or off-campus
long_term: Maintain a consistent exercise routine
Adopt stress management techniques like meditation or yoga

STM: Noticed the high cost of living in NYC, feeling the financial pinch from everyday expenses like coffee.
Realizing the need for better time management to balance academic demands with personal time, potentially impacting financial planning.

MTM.Summary: Realizing the financial realities of college life.
MTM.Patterns: High living costs, need for better time management
MTM.Goals: Budget effectively, seek part-time work, manage finances

short_term: Create a monthly budget
Apply for on-campus jobs or scholarships
long_term: Save for future educational expenses
Learn about investing and financial planning

STM: Questioning life decisions and feeling out of place, pondering if everyone else is pretending to have it together.
Reflecting on the authenticity of happiness and the societal expectations of college life.

MTM.Summary: Questioning life decisions and societal expectations.
MTM.Patterns: Feeling out of place, pondering authenticity of happiness
MTM.Goals: Find personal direction, define own success, embrace authenticity
MTM.Transition: Reflecting on personal identity in a new environment.

LTM.Implications: Influences future decisions and personal growth.

short_term: Start a journal to document personal growth
Discuss life goals with a mentor or counselor
long_term: Develop a clear personal philosophy
Align career choices with personal values and passions

short_term: Explore new software tools relevant to studies
Learn basic coding for personal projects
long_term: Stay updated with emerging technologies
Consider how technology can enhance personal and career development

STM: Landed a summer internship through family connections, aiming to break into the quantitative finance sector.
Exploring career options in quant finance, feeling out of place but hopeful for future acceptance.
Engaging in self-education on trading and blockchain technology, considering internship opportunities at prestigious firms like Jane Street.

MTM.Summary: Exploring career options in quantitative finance.
MTM.Patterns: Internship through connections, self-education on trading, feeling out of place
MTM.Goals: Secure internship, gain industry knowledge, improve networking skills
MTM.Transition: Transitioning from academic to professional finance.

MTM.Patterns: Difficulty with CS and Calculus, feeling overwhelmed, seeking solace in new friendships
MTM.Goals: Improve grades, manage workload, maintain social connections

LTM.Implications: Marks the beginning of higher education journey.

LTM.Milestone: Secured first internship in quantitative finance.
LTM.Implications: First professional experience in desired field.

short_term: Secure another internship in quantitative finance or related field
Improve grades in CS and Calculus
long_term: Establish a career in quantitative finance
Achieve a senior or leadership position in finance

STM: Reconnected with a high school friend, feeling the impact of time and change.
First date went well with someone from class, looking forward to a second meeting.
Feeling the social pressure at mixers, considering alternative ways to meet new people.

MTM.Summary: Navigating new romantic and social engagements.
MTM.Patterns: Reconnecting with old friends, first date, feeling social pressure
MTM.Goals: Form meaningful connections, explore romantic relationships, manage social anxiety
MTM.Transition: Navigating new social dynamics at college.

MTM.Summary: Facing challenges in maintaining and building new relationships.
MTM.Patterns: Disconnection from high school friends, awkwardness with roommates, social missteps
MTM.Goals: Strengthen existing relationships, form new bonds, improve social skills
MTM.Transition: Navigating the social dynamics of college life.

LTM.Milestone: Transition to dorm life at college.
LTM.Implications: Significant shift in living environment and social circle.

short_term: Form a stable romantic relationship
Strengthen connections with college friends
long_term: Maintain long-term friendships from college
Build a supportive network of relationships

STM: Struggling with the heat in the city, affecting daily comfort and well-being.
Overwhelmed by deadlines, questioning the healthiness of current lifestyle.
Experiencing the excitement and nervousness of new romantic engagements.

MTM.Summary: Struggling with environmental and lifestyle challenges.
MTM.Patterns: Heat affecting comfort, overwhelmed by deadlines, excitement and nervousness of new engagements
MTM.Goals: Adapt to city living, manage stress, maintain health

MTM.Summary: Experiencing sleep deprivation and health concerns.
MTM.Patterns: Sleep issues due to dorm environment, health concerns from dining hall food
MTM.Goals: Establish sleep routine, prioritize healthy eating, reduce stress

short_term: Establish a consistent sleep schedule
Find healthier eating options on campus
long_term: Maintain a balanced lifestyle with regular exercise and diet
Develop coping mechanisms for stress

STM: Interested in crypto and blockchain, contemplating investment and understanding market trends.
Actively researching and discussing stocks, NFTs, and trading strategies with peers.
Expressed desire for financial success, inspired by figures like Zhao in the crypto world.

MTM.Patterns: Interest in crypto, discussing stocks, inspired by financial success stories
MTM.Goals: Invest wisely, understand market trends, achieve financial independence
MTM.Transition: Developing a proactive approach to personal finance.

MTM.Summary: Realizing the financial realities of college life.
MTM.Patterns: High living costs, need for better time management
MTM.Goals: Budget effectively, seek part-time work, manage finances

short_term: Create a personal budget and stick to it
Invest a small amount in cryptocurrency or stocks
long_term: Achieve financial independence
Build a diverse investment portfolio

STM: Feeling out of touch with modern trends and technologies, questioning personal adaptation.
Reflecting on the rapid changes in life and the world, feeling grateful for personal growth and new connections.
Contemplating the future of technology and its integration into art, society, and personal life.

MTM.Summary: Contemplating personal growth and societal changes.
MTM.Patterns: Feeling out of touch, reflecting on life changes, contemplating technology integration
MTM.Goals: Adapt to modern trends, embrace personal growth, integrate technology into life
MTM.Transition: Navigating identity and growth in a rapidly changing world.

MTM.Summary: Questioning life decisions and societal expectations.
MTM.Patterns: Feeling out of place, pondering authenticity of happiness
MTM.Goals: Find personal direction, define own success, embrace authenticity
MTM.Transition: Reflecting on personal identity in a new environment.

LTM.Implications: Influences future decisions and personal growth.

short_term: Regularly journal personal growth and reflections
Participate in philosophical discussions or groups
long_term: Develop a personal philosophy of life
Contribute to societal discussions on technology and ethics

STM: Curious about Ethereum and NFTs, exploring their potential impact on digital art and finance.
Engaged with new trading tools and strategies, excited about integrating blockchain into gaming.
Learning about cryptocurrencies and blockchain, particularly Bitcoin's origin story and its implications.

MTM.Summary: Exploring new technologies and their applications.
MTM.Patterns: Interest in Ethereum, NFTs, blockchain in gaming, Bitcoin's implications
MTM.Goals: Understand blockchain, apply technology to personal interests, stay updated
MTM.Transition: Becoming more tech-savvy and integrating technology into personal life.

short_term: Learn about blockchain technology in-depth
Experiment with developing a simple NFT or blockchain application
long_term: Integrate blockchain into personal or professional projects
Stay at the forefront of emerging technologies
